error.message: Configuration entity must define a `config_export` key. See https://www.drupal.org/node/2481909

Parameter $event of method Drupal\simple_ip_login\EventSubscriber\UserPageVisitSubscriber::auto_logout() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
